resources.string: A colossal parliament building known for its ornate interior composed of 23 sections, it houses the Senate and the Chamber of Deputies, three museums and an international conference center.

The Romanian Athenaeum (Romanian: Ateneul Român) is a concert hall in the center of Bucharest, Romania and a landmark of the Romanian capital city. Opened in 1888, the ornate, domed, circular building is the city\'s main concert hall and home of the \"George Enescu\" Philharmonic and of the George Enescu annual international music festival.
Piața Arcul de Triumf, Sector 1, Bucharest

The current arch has a height of 27 metres and was built after the plans of the architect Petre Antonescu. It has as its foundation a 25 x 11.50 metres rectangle. The sculptures with which the facades are decorated were created by famous Romanian sculptors such as Ion Jalea and Dimitrie Paciurea. Nowadays, military parades are held beneath the arch each 1 December, with the occasion of Romania\'s national holiday.

Between 1679 and 1681 the prince Şerban Cantacuzino (1678 - 1688) built, in the West of Bucharest, the Cotroceni ensemble, his most important architectural endeavour. It stood out through the Assumption Church, dedicated to Virgin Mary, a structure similar in style to the one in Curtea de Argeş, and through the impressive palace, decorated in the Baroque style that dominated Western European architecture at that time.

The National Museum George Enescu was opened in the Cantacuzino Palace, one of the most beautiful buildings in Bucharest, a historical monument and one of the European Heritage Label buildings. The sumptuous entrance, in Art Nouveau style, announces the luxury and the refinement of the époque, reunited in one of the most imposing palaces in Bucharest.

The story of Fitto Cafe begins seven years ago. It all started with an apple, which became our symbol, because it represents a fresh and healthy diet, hence the quotation „An apple a day keeps the doctor away! Today, Fitto Cafe is, as we like to call it, another type of cafe. It is what you need in a crowded Bucharest, a cozy place, where you can have a quick and tasty breakfast, a healthy lunch or enjoy a relaxing dinner and a glass of wine.

The story of Fitto Cafe begins seven years ago. It all started with an apple, which became our symbol, because it represents a fresh and healthy diet, hence the quotation „An apple a day keeps the doctor away! Today, Fitto Cafe is, as we like to call it, another type of cafe. It is what you need in a crowded Bucharest, a cozy place, where you can have a quick and tasty breakfast, a healthy lunch or enjoy a relaxing dinner and a glass of wine.

Chefs Experience este un restaurant care ofera mai mult decat preparate savuroase, unul care promite ca timpul petrecut sa fie o adevarata experienta. Cu un design ecletic cu influente industriale, Chefs te uimeste inca de la intrare prin asocierea elementelor si detaliilor folosite, si te introduce intr-o atmosfera inedita si relaxanta.

Victoriei 18 este un restaurant-vitrina care aduce in acelasi spatiu atat preparate savuroase, cat si piese de design romanesc. Legatura locatiei cu designul a inceput cu mult timp in urmă, cand in locul restaurantului se afla magazinul Expo Moda, care a stabilit in anii \‘60 – \’80 printre putinele contacte ale capitalei cu moda occidentala. Acum, Expo Moda e prezenta nu doar prin literele originale din vechea fatada, care sunt restaurate si folosite in amenajarea spatiului, ci si in esenta conceptului Victoriei 18, care isi propune sa sustina si sa expuna obiecte realizate de designeri romani.
Noul Bocca Lupo arata foarte bine, simtindu-se din plin mana si inspiratia arhitectului Cristian Corvin.

Ramada Majestic Bucharest Hotel is located at the \“0\” Km of Bucharest, in the business, financial, cultural and shopping centre of Bucharest, closely to \“Universitatii Square\”, considered “the heart of Bucharest, on Calea Victoriei, one of the oldest main street in Bucharest, the site of many monuments and important institutions.

Rest well in sumptuous 5-star accommodation in an enviable site by Cismigiu Park. Our hotel features 487 well-appointed rooms and suites featuring the creativity of architect Uri Blumenthal and designer Buki Zuker. Guests benefit from aesthetic appeal as well as modern amenities such as a SMART LED TV and Free high-speed, wireless Internet.

With historic elegance and refined luxury, the JW Marriott Bucharest Grand Hotel inspires extraordinary experiences here in Romania. Our staff is dedicated to providing every visitor with first-class service. We\'re a short distance away from the city\'s famed Old Town, next to Parliament Palace and easy access to Bucharest\'s most popular attractions.

Contact the Park Inn by Radisson Bucharest Hotel Residence to make reservations at the perfect lodging choice for both corporate and leisure travellers with any itinerary. Rest well in one of the rooms, or opt for an apartment for an extended holiday. On-site dining options include a convenient all-day restaurant, lobby bar and a delightful breakfast establishment. The 4 flexible meeting facilities provide ample space and equipment for events, both business and personal.

Hotel Royal is located just minutes away from the centre of Bucharest and the historical centre itself. Also within walking distance are good public transport links to the business and shopping areas along with numerous touristic attractions.

Discover a breath-taking panorama of our city and enjoy your visit in Bucharest at Hotel Unique, a boutique hotel offering you accommodation at international standards and high quality amenities. We have the great pleasure to welcome our guests in a modern hotel in Bucharest redecorated and up-graded each year continuing improving amenities year by year and day by day till now August 2015 with a brand new relaxing Summer Garden.

Bucharest Zoo Garden is a great place to spend an afternoon when you visit the Romanian Capital. The Zoo is outside Bucharest, near Baneasa Forest and also near Baneasa Shopping Center. So, if you have time and need some fresh air and also a shopping tour in an elegant mall, you might like the area. You have the 301 bus to take you right at the Zoo.

Summer 
 Monday - Friday: 9:00- 19:00
 Saturday-Sunday: 8:00 - 18:00
 Winter 
 Monday - Sunday: 9:00- 17:00

Orășelul Cunoașterii este un science center deschis în februarie 2014, în București. Scopul nostru este să \"împrietenim\" copiii cu științele, prin joc, să le explicăm lumea într-un limbaj simplu și amuzant. Iar joaca nu este doar pentru copii.
Observatorul Astronomic \"Amiral Vasile Urseanu\" al Municipiului București, este o instituție muzeistică, destinată popularizării astronomiei, subunitate a Muzeului Municipiului București.
Muzeul CFR este locul în care puteți plonja înapoi în timp, parcurgând istoria de peste un secol al uneia dintre cele mai spectaculoase invenții omenești: calea ferată.
Unul dintre cele mai cunoscute muzee din Bucuresti si din tara, Muzeul Antipa a fost intotdeauna preferatul celor mici.
Parcul Kiseleff este un parc din București, amplasat de-o parte și de alta a Șoselei Kiseleff în triunghiul descris de bulevardul Ion Mihalache, bulevardul Aviatorilor și strada Ion Mincu.
One step into Spice Club, and you know you\’ve arrived somewhere special. Bring your friends, we have enough space.
Oldies isi propune sa dezvolte un mix de muzica, dans, cultura, arta in toate formele sale.
Singurul club din Centrul Istoric (Bucuresti) in care muzica live are exclusivitate!
Ne-am propus sa mizam pe o politica in care sa punem un accent deosebit pe calitatea produselor din oferta.
The place Where the City Never sleeps and where you will find: amazing parties, beautifull people, great music, awsome drinks.
